Roger, we have a two-part succession planning webinar series that begins on April 9. It will focus on how succession planning has to evolve into talent management in today's workplace in order to facilitate knowledge transfer. Here's the link: http://learning.icma.org/store/seminar/seminar.php?seminar=25604&pc=spotlight

Hi Roger, 
Although these resources aren't all specific to small agency succession planning the basic principals should still apply. 
-Here is a recent blog post that includes the top four resources on succession planning http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/2204/Time_to_Transform_Succession_Planning
-Additionally you should check out the succession planning topic page as new information on succession planning is being added every dayhttp://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/252/Succession_Planning
